title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, its height remains the same.
EB: When modifying the font size of a label, its height should adjust to match the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label to the application. 
2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
3. Observe that the height of the label does not change to match the new font size.
